v8:item.v8:content: Cannot start data synchronization. Try again later or <link ExpectSynchronizationCapability>wait for synchronization to become available...</>
Synchronization is already in progress for this node.
Waiting for data synchronization to start. Please wait…
Enter the password to log in to the web application.
Data synchronization may take a while if: • The connection is slow • The amount of data to sync is big • An application update is available online
Warning on exchange via internal publication
Once you close the window, synchronization will run in the background. To stop it, click "Finish synchronization".
Cannot synchronize data. Please contact the administrator.
Exchange completed with update required error
Update required user has no rights
An application update is received from "%1". The data synchronization will continue after the update installation. Please contact the administrator.
An application update is received from "%1." Please install the update, then the data synchronization will continue.
Error assigning ID to a node
Picture error assigning ID to a node

Duplicate data synchronization settings are detected.
For a correction method, see the <link 1>instruction</>
Exchange completed with error Restart required
Configuration extensions are changed. To continue with the changes made, restart the application.
